data.text:
I could say Haram to this Hotel.
First we entered and they let us to wait,.
We were given the key card without any information at all. It's like "take it and go".
Worst part the room.  I feel uncomfortable. Idont know if the things there were already used. Ceiling was  dripping in the toilet. Toilet seats are wet. Tissue not flushed well. Basin has goey thing. No toothbrush aswell. Towels were hanged like they dont care. No maintenance i could say. Worst part we are about to wake up and supposed to wash the kettle and the cup but to our shock the kettle was sooo diiirttty. Plus its rusty.. The blower was not attached to the plug which is undearneath the  table of the tv. It was so hard i even need to reach it myself... Cause the plug is in a small hole. Idont know its so frustrating..
data.title: Never Again. Not recommended at all

data.text:
I recently booked a room here and if I would be able to give 0/5 stars I would. 
My first complaint is the poor customer service. As you walk in no one says hello, good morning or how are you. This is a hotel. You are hired to offer a service. But no one offers you any service of warmth. You feel awkward walking in and staff watching you instead of greeting you. 
My second complaint is the lack of cleanliness for this place. Room service is so bad you might as well clean the room yourself. Below i’ve shown pics of garage not being moved- despite the service bell being on. Why am I paying for a dirty place.
Third of all do not get me started on how our dated the rooms are. This place claims a 4 star, but doesn’t even match a 2 star standard. No
sockets work to charge, the safe when mini fridge didn’t work either, I had to request for them
to change it. Also, the walls are not nice. They are covered in weird black marks , you can see below in my pics. A place that is 4 stars is clean and modest but this place is not that.
Also, if you are allergic to tabacoo and cigarettes don’t stay here. Doesn’t matter if you are in a smoking room or not, the hall way will stink of smoke causing you to cough. 
And, the location is genuinely rubbish. It’s basically next to nothing and there is nothing good to eat nearby. 
Honestly save your money and do not fall for the description of this place. You will not feel welcomed or treated like you are a customer. Spend a little bit more money and time
to research better options, but stay away from here. 
Thank you
data.title: Stay away from here

data.text:
Terrible experience . Rooms are very cold , not clean , we check in for 5 nights And amenities such as shampoo shower gel or coffe tea was just upon arrival , housekeepers clean rooms as it’s punishment , towels are old and broken , all time just one towel in the room , no hand towel . We call every day for towel to bring second as we are two person . Sometimes they just ignore request and don’t bring it at all . 
Doors and furnitures are dirty and stained . 
There’s no even hair dryer . 
I’m working in hotel industry as manager for years and I never experienced hotel like this . Definetly not 4 star . Avoid in all cost ! Not worth the price . I would give it 1 star .
data.title: AVOID IN ALL COST

data.text: Front office agent named "Mina" was the most rude person ive ever encounter. Ive been travelling around the Asia and Eu, but his behaviour is the worst one. Was about to meet my friends but ended with a terrible experience.
data.title: Front office agent was worst.

data.text: Excellent value for money, everything perfect. As a business traveller I know what I want and Carlton Al Barsha ticked all the boxes. Functional room- good lights , good AC. Good breakfast.  Oh and I arrived morning time from a night flight and they let me check in 7 hours early at no charge. Perfect .
data.title: Great hotel, all good.
